body:
We use the lua, before go1.5, but compiled to Amd64 cgo cannot compile, therefore has remained at 386.
On go1.5, lua can compile successfully for the Windows - amd64, currently still remain in the amd64, is to want to take a look at this fault will not happen again.
Our software is not released to production environment, traffic system is very low, memory consumption is less than 100M.
